fields.Title: Introduction to the anthology "Becoming Basque."
fields.Author/Editor of larger work: John Bieter, John Ysursa, Dave Lachiando
fields.Description/Abstract:
This is the fifth volume of the Investigate Boise Community Research Series.  Six student and four professional essays related Basque heritage to urban design. John Bieter, John Ysursa, and David Lachiando were the principle investigators. Shallat, series editor, produced the book, writing introduction, captions, and sidebars.  
Explanation of Other:  Edited book of peer-reviewed essays in the Investigate Boise Community Research Series, volume 5 (2014)
